Structs/Richi/Error.html#/s:5RichiAAV5Er.name: assetError(_:)
Structs/Richi/Error.html#/s:5RichiAAV5Er.abstract: The player could not play the current asset

Structs/Richi/Error.html#/s:5RichiAAV5Er.name: assetNotPlayable
Structs/Richi/Error.html#/s:5RichiAAV5Er.abstract: The given asset is not playable because of an undisclosed reason

Structs/Richi/Error.html#/s:5RichiAAV5Er.name: playerItemError(_:)
Structs/Richi/Error.html#/s:5RichiAAV5Er.abstract: The player could not play the current item

Structs/Richi/EndAction.html#/s:5RichiAA.name: freeze
Structs/Richi/EndAction.html#/s:5RichiAA.abstract: The player should freeze at the end

Structs/Richi/Asset.html#/s:5RichiAAV5As.name: headers
Structs/Richi/Asset.html#/s:5RichiAAV5As.abstract: Headers to be sent with the request to the given URL

Structs/Richi/Asset.html#/s:5RichiAAV5As.name: init(url:headers:mimeType:)
Structs/Richi/Asset.html#/s:5RichiAAV5As.abstract: Creates a new asset object that models the media at the specified URL.

Structs/Richi/BufferingState.html#/s:5Ri.name: unknown
Structs/Richi/BufferingState.html#/s:5Ri.abstract: The buffer is in an undefined state

Structs/Richi/BufferingState.html#/s:5Ri.name: delayed
Structs/Richi/BufferingState.html#/s:5Ri.abstract: The playback is delayed until the buffer fills up

Structs/Richi/PlaybackState.html#/s:5Ric.name: failed(_:)
Structs/Richi/PlaybackState.html#/s:5Ric.abstract: The playback has failed because of the encapsulated error.

Structs/Richi/Gravity.html#/s:5RichiAAV7.name: aspectFill
Structs/Richi/Gravity.html#/s:5RichiAAV7.abstract: The player should preserve the video’s aspect ratio and fill the layer’s bounds.

Structs/Richi/Gravity.html#/s:5RichiAAV7.name: aspectFit
Structs/Richi/Gravity.html#/s:5RichiAAV7.abstract: The player should preserve the video’s aspect ratio and fit the video within the layer’s bounds.

Structs/Richi/Gravity.html#/s:5RichiAAV7.name: fill
Structs/Richi/Gravity.html#/s:5RichiAAV7.abstract: The video should be stretched to fill the layer’s bounds.

Structs/Richi/Gravity.html.name: Gravity
Structs/Richi/Gravity.html.abstract: An enum that describes how the video is displayed within a layer’s bounds rectangle.

Structs/Richi/PlaybackState.html.name: PlaybackState
Structs/Richi/PlaybackState.html.abstract: An enum that describes the playback state of the Video Player

Structs/Richi/BufferingState.html.name: BufferingState
Structs/Richi/BufferingState.html.abstract: An enum that describes the current buffer state

Structs/Richi/Asset.html.name: Asset
Structs/Richi/Asset.html.abstract: A struct that models timed audiovisual media.

Structs/Richi/EndAction.html.name: EndAction
Structs/Richi/EndAction.html.abstract: The actions a player can take when it finishes playing.

Structs/Richi/Error.html.name: Error
Structs/Richi/Error.html.abstract: This enum is used for all errors that are generated by this library.

Structs/Richi.html.name: Richi
Structs/Richi.html.abstract: This struct provides a scope for global structures and enums that need to be accessible publicly.

Protocols/VideoPlayerTimeDelegate.html#/.name: player(_:didChangeCurrentTime:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerTimeDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the playback time of the current asset has changed.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: playerReady(_:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the video player is ready to play assets.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: player(_:didChangePlaybackStateFrom:to:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the internal playback state of the video player has changed.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: player(_:didChangeBufferingStateFrom:to:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the internal buffering state of the video player has changed.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: player(_:didChangeBufferTime:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the buffering time has changed.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: player(_:didFailWithError:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the player did fail with the given error.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: player(_:didLoadAsset:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the player has loaded the asset.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: playerWillStartFromBeginning(_:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the player will start playback from the beginning.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: playerDidEnd(_:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the playback of the current item did end.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: playerWillLoop(_:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the playback of the current item is about to loop.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.name: playerDidLoop(_:)
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html#/s:5R.abstract: Tells the delegate that the playback of the current item did loop.

Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html.name: VideoPlayerDelegate
Protocols/VideoPlayerDelegate.html.abstract: A set of methods which allow to respond to video player events.

Protocols/VideoPlayerTimeDelegate.html.name: VideoPlayerTimeDelegate
Protocols/VideoPlayerTimeDelegate.html.abstract: A set of methods which allow to respond to video player time changes.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: gravity
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: A value that specifies how the video is displayed within the view’s bounds.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: autoplay
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Determines if the video should autoplay

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: volume
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: The audio playback volume for the player.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: isMuted
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio output of the player is muted.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: preventsDisplaySleepDuringPlayback
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether video playback prevents display and device sleep.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: isPlaying
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: A boolean value that indicates whether video playback is playing

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: rate
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: The current playback rate

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: actionAtEnd
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: The action to perform when the current player item has finished playing.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: pauseWhenResigningActive
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Controls if playback is paused when the application is no longer active.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: pauseWhenEnteringBackground
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Controls if playback is paused when the application enters the background.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: resumeWhenBecomingActive
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Controls if playback is resumed when the application has become active.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: resumeWhenEnteringForeground
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Controls if playback is resumed when the application is about to enter the foreground

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: asset
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: The current asset

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: playbackState
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Current playback state of the Player

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: bufferingState
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Current buffering state of the Player

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: duration
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Maximum duration of playback.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: currentTime
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Media playback’s current time.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: preferredPeakBitRate
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Indicates the desired limit of network bandwidth consumption for this item.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: preferredMaximumResolution
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Indicates a preferred upper limit on the resolution of the video to be downloaded.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: currentDuration
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Media playback’s current time interval in seconds.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: delegate
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the video player view

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: timeDelegate
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: The object that acts as the time delegate of the video player view

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: timeObserverInterval
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: The time interval at which time observers should

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/c:@M@Richi@obj.name: init()
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/c:@M@Richi@obj.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated player view object with a zero rect frame.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/c:@M@Richi@obj.name: init(coder:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/c:@M@Richi@obj.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated player view object from the specified coder.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: boundaryTimePublisher(forTimes:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Creates a publisher that emits an event when specified times are traversed during normal playback.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: periodicTimePublisher(forInterval:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Creates a publisher that periodically emits the changing time of the current playback.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: load(asset:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Loads the given asset and prepares the player.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: playFromBeginning()
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Plays the current asset from the beginning

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: play(_:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Continues playing the current asset if shouldPlay is true,

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: pause()
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Pauses playback of the current asset

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: stop()
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Stops playback of the current asset.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: seek(to:completionHandler:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Sets the current playback time to the specified time and executes the specified block when the seek operation completes or is interrupted.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: seek(to:toleranceBefore:toleranceAfter:completionHandler:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Sets the current playback time within a specified time bound and invokes the specified block when the seek operation completes or is interrupted.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: snapshot(at:completion:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Captures a snapshot of the current media at the specified time.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: addBoundaryTimeObserver(forTimes:queue:using:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Requests the invocation of a block when specified times are traversed during normal playback.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: addPeriodicTimeObserver(forInterval:queue:using:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Requests the periodic invocation of a given block during playback to report changing time.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.name: removeTimeObserver(_:)
Classes/VideoPlayer.html#/s:5Richi11Vide.abstract: Cancels a previously registered periodic or boundary time observer.

Classes/VideoPlayer.html.name: VideoPlayer
Classes/VideoPlayer.html.abstract: An object that displays a single video asset or a playlist of video assets in your interface.
